name: learnhub-auth
description: LearnHub - Online Learning Platform with Authentication

scripts.test-contact: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const db = JSON.parse(fs.readFileSync('db.json', 'utf8')); console.log('Contacts in db:', db.contacts);"
scripts.test-api: node -e "fetch('http://localhost:3001/users').then(r => r.json()).then(d => console.log('Users:', d)).catch(e => console.error('API Error:', e))"
scripts.start: echo 'Starting JSON Server...' && npm run server
scripts.reset-db: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const defaultDB = { users: [], contacts: [], enrollments: [], courses: [] }; fs.writeFileSync('db.json', JSON.stringify(defaultDB, null, 2)); console.log('Database reset to empty state')"
scripts.backup-db: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const date = new Date().toISOString().split('T')[0]; fs.copyFileSync('db.json', 'db-backup-' + date + '.json'); console.log('Database backed up')"

author: LearnHub Team
